## function_callWidgetFactoryWithConfig
> **callWidgetFactoryWithConfig**\<`W`\>(`parameter`): [`AngularWidget`](../types#angularwidget)\<`W`\>

### Type Parameters

• **W** *extends* [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<`object`, `object`, `object`, `object`, `object`\>

### Parameters

• **parameter**

the parameter

• **parameter.afterInit?**

a callback to call after successful setup of the widget

• **parameter.defaultConfig?**: [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\> \| [`ReadableSignal`](https://amadeusitgroup.github.io/tansu/interfaces/ReadableSignal.html)\<`undefined` \| [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\>\>

• **parameter.widgetConfig?**: `null` \| [`ReadableSignal`](https://amadeusitgroup.github.io/tansu/interfaces/ReadableSignal.html)\<`undefined` \| [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\>\>
